title: Welcome to the IWCI: Meet the contenders!

replies.body: LET'S GO CHIEFS, LOCK 'EM UP BOYS!
Don't let OCE down this time Chiefs! You can do it!
Saigon Jokers are gonna blow everyone away in this event

You have committed heresy against the holy church of oceania. You shall be forced to endure three tests or your faith.
The first test: Trial by Flay. How many times can Thresh flay you before you die?
The second test: Trial by Hate. How long can you survive against an Evelynn in URF mode?
The third test: Trial by Copper. How long can you last in Bronze 5 before tilting?

Only if you pass these trials will you be allowed to return to the oceanic utopia ruled by none other than the triads.

Haha.
Well test 1, not sure about, test 2 is very easy... Galio. Test 3 would be fun, am I allowed to troll and bring a light sabre to cut through that copper, namely Master Yi? :)

"They were denied a trip to Wildcard back in 2014 Legacy and..."

Let's add a by in there lads!
intz and detonation pls lube up chiefs first. best of luck to chiefs. really gonna need it. no hate on chiefs just intz and dn are really good.

> [{quoted}](name=Hot Pope,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=PujFV0No,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-04-18T08:26:32.246+0000)
>
> intz and detonation pls lube up chiefs first. best of luck to chiefs. really gonna need it. no hate on chiefs just intz and dn are really good.

Chiefs beat INTZ, and they play DFM (who are at the bottom of the standings) tomorrow. Chiefs could make the playoffs yet.

> [{quoted}](name=Main Line,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=PujFV0No,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2016-04-19T07:22:23.565+0000)
>
> Chiefs beat INTZ, and they play DFM (who are at the bottom of the standings) tomorrow. Chiefs could make the playoffs yet.

well I hope they can carry on winnin and make it to MSI and maybe even worlds, I wouldn't get my high hopes up but it would be a possibility, INTZ were playing a lot lot better last IWCI. Lets hope DN don't get the best of Chiefs tonight. Happy 4/20 btw blaze it up

edit: nah chiefs played like complete poo lmao, not even close to the performance they showed in opl, they may be doing us proud at home but goddamn they're doing bad in IWCI. they're coming last and they're making horrible decisions, Whiffer just counterpicked himself into a Lissandra by picking Kassadin. He couldn't join fights and kept leaving fights for easy 4v5s for Detonation, I knew Detonation would win before but yeah DFM are NOT at the bottom of the standings, they are 5th opposed to Chief's last spot. Alistar's early pick was really great but Chiefs still had an early advantage that they didn't push because they wasted their teleports so early to try to save Swiper who was already going into a re-active role playing as Maokai, another pick that brought them down, if they picked Trundle and someone with either earlier presence (syndra could have melted her early game) or push power (twisted fate and azir were open) they could have easily pushed that early lead, also, sp00kz not joining top lane to win the first tower race and having the gold advantage of 4 people getting the extra gold (due to gold given to champions around turret when it dies), everyone fell back and it was just 1 person on the turret to Detonation's 2/3 because their jungler wanted to counterjungle blue side, which still gets him gold while sp00kz had already completed a counterjungle clear for enemy blue side and had no where to get gold from, so he runs back and picks up a scuttle and then dies in his jungle when he gets back like man if u'd just stay for turret and back, you'd get an extra amount of money, not be dead and still be able to lanetax when whiffer had to go back from liss' poke.

> [{quoted}](name=Hot Pope,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=PujFV0No,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2016-04-20T04:30:42.605+0000)
>
> edit: nah chiefs played like complete poo lmao

That game was a disaster in all departments. Champ select to laning to the jungle. INTZ got to 5-2 so the early losses cost Chiefs.

Detonation Focus Me with 2 Korean imports and the three best Japanese players in the region - destroyed.

Who's Next?
B*tch Please... Chiefs hopefully do well but INTZ 100% will win..
The Brazilian team is the best one. Unfortunately They will win, write it down. And just watch the player Revolta for INTZ. He is the jgler
